function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective communication and collaboration among healthcare professionals","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, delayed treatment, and compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Implementing communication tools, training programs, and interdisciplinary team meetings","Technologies":"Communication platforms, teleconferencing, and mobile applications","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to preventive supplies and antiseptics","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare-associated infections and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular supply chain management, staff training on infection control, and allocation of resources for preventive supplies","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, automated supply chain solutions, and online procurement platforms","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Lack of support for isolated workers and those with chronic diseases","Impact":"Increased stress, burnout, and reduced productivity among healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, flexible work arrangements, and access to resources for self-care","Technologies":"Telemedicine services, virtual support groups, and wellness apps","People":"Isolated workers, workers with chronic diseases","Owner":"Human resources, hospital management"}]}
